title: Welcome Week Bash
description: Kick off the academic year with live music, fun activities, and a chance to meet new friends!
extendedDescription: Join the entire campus community to celebrate the start of a new academic year at the Welcome Week Bash. Enjoy a wide range of musical performances, interactive games, and food stalls. Perfect for making new friends and getting involved in campus life!

title: Tech Hackathon
description: Challenge yourself at our annual hackathon with a chance to win prizes and network with tech professionals.
extendedDescription: The annual Tech Hackathon invites coding enthusiasts to compete in a thrilling challenge. Solve problems, develop innovative solutions, and network with industry leaders. Prizes include tech gadgets, internships, and more!

title: Cultural Festival
description: Explore diverse cultures with food stalls, traditional performances, and crafts.
extendedDescription: This vibrant festival showcases the rich cultural diversity of our campus with performances from around the world, authentic cuisine, and artisan crafts. A day of education, celebration, and fun for everyone.

title: Sustainability Drive
description: Join us for a day of workshops and activities aimed at promoting sustainability on campus.
extendedDescription: Participate in interactive workshops and discussions on sustainability topics, including waste reduction, renewable energy, and sustainable agriculture. Learn how you can contribute to a greener campus and world.

title: Career Fair
description: Meet top employers and learn about potential career paths in various industries.
extendedDescription: Connect with potential employers from a variety of fields, receive career advice, and make valuable contacts. Bring your resume and prepare for on-the-spot interviews and internship offers.

title: Mental Health Awareness Day
description: Participate in workshops and activities designed to promote mental well-being and resilience.
extendedDescription: Dedicated to raising awareness about mental health issues, this event features workshops on mindfulness, stress management, and emotional resilience. Resources and support for mental health will be available.

title: Sports Tournament
description: Compete or cheer in our campus-wide sports day. Open to all skill levels.
extendedDescription: Our annual Sports Tournament features team competitions in basketball, soccer, and more. Whether you're competing or just cheering, it's a great way to showcase school spirit and athletic prowess.

title: Film Screening Night
description: Join us for a night under the stars watching recent blockbusters and classic films.
extendedDescription: Enjoy an outdoor cinema experience featuring a selection of blockbuster hits and timeless classics. Bring a blanket, grab some popcorn, and enjoy a movie under the stars.

title: Entrepreneurship Workshop
description: Learn from successful entrepreneurs and gain insights into starting your own business.
extendedDescription: This workshop offers practical advice, strategies, and inspiration from successful entrepreneurs. Ideal for aspiring business owners and innovators.

title: Open Mic Night
description: Showcase your talents or enjoy a night of performances from your peers at our monthly open mic event.
extendedDescription: Our Open Mic Night is a platform for students to express themselves through music, poetry, and storytelling. Come and discover the hidden talents within our community.
